Class GDPRRequestController

java.lang.Object
be.helha.gdprapp.controllers.GDPRRequestController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/gdpr-requests") @CrossOrigin(origins="*") public class GDPRRequestController extends Object

    • getGDPRRequestById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or @gdprRequestService.canUserAccessRequest(#id, @userService.getCurrentUser().idUser)") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GDPRRequest> getGDPRRequestById(@PathVariable Integer id)
